name: DelegatedGov
description: DelegatedGov. governance for biopset protocol. governance for biopset protocol BIOP.

parameterDecorators.name: newPool_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the EBOP20 pool to add.

functionDecorators.name: addUpdateTradingPair
functionDecorators.description: add (or update the RateCalc of existing) trading pair.

parameterDecorators.name: newPP_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of trading pair to be added.

parameterDecorators.name: newRateCalc_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the rate calc to be used for this pair.

parameterDecorators.name: acc
parameterDecorators.description: the account to get the answer for.

functionDecorators.name: closeStaking
functionDecorators.description: prevent new deposits into the pool. Effectivly end the protocol. This cannot be undone.

functionDecorators.name: delegate
functionDecorators.description: delegates your voting power to a specific address(sha).

parameterDecorators.name: newSha
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the delegate to voting power.

parameterDecorators.name: nx_
parameterDecorators.description: the new boolean value of rewardsEnabled.

parameterDecorators.name: oldPool_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the pool to remove.

parameterDecorators.name: oldPP_
parameterDecorators.description: the address of trading pair to be removed.

functionDecorators.name: stake
functionDecorators.description: stake your BIOP and begin earning rewards.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount in BIOP you want to stake.

functionDecorators.name: uMNOT
functionDecorators.description: update the maximum time an option can be created for.

parameterDecorators.name: newMinTime_
parameterDecorators.description: the time (in seconds) of maximum possible bet.

functionDecorators.name: uMXOT
functionDecorators.description: update the maximum time an option can be created for.

parameterDecorators.name: nMT_
parameterDecorators.description: the time (in seconds) of maximum possible bet.

functionDecorators.name: undelegate
functionDecorators.description: undelegate your voting power. you will still earn staking rewards but your voting power won't back any delegate.

functionDecorators.name: updateAccessTiers
functionDecorators.description: change the access tiers contract address used to guard all access tier functions.

parameterDecorators.name: newAccessTiers_
parameterDecorators.description: the new access tiers contract to use. It should conform to AccessTiers interface.

functionDecorators.name: updateBetFee
functionDecorators.description: update the fee paid by betters when they make a bet.

parameterDecorators.name: newBetFee_
parameterDecorators.description: the time (in seconds) of the soft pool lock.

functionDecorators.name: updatePoolLockTime
functionDecorators.description: update soft lock time for the main pool.

parameterDecorators.name: newLockSeconds_
parameterDecorators.description: the time (in seconds) of the soft pool lock.

parameterDecorators.name: newPA_
parameterDecorators.description: the new protocol contract to use. It should conform to BinaryOptions interface.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: withdraw your BIOP and stop earning rewards. You must undelegate before you can withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: the amount in BIOP you want to withdraw.
